title: Mini OSINT Chain
description: Investigate the domain 'academy-example.org'. Step 1: Use WHOIS to identify the registrar. Step 2: Use DNS lookup to find the first IPv4 A record. Step 3: Use IP geolocation to identify the country code. Combine the results as REGISTRAR_IP_COUNTRY (uppercase, registrar = first word only).
hints: Break the task into three separate steps.
